name: ARPAN: SAMAJ UTTHAN SAMITI
briefDescription: 1. Vivekanand Rural Education Mission, running Vivekanand School in Jhagarpur villages (Block-Lailunga), Dt.-Raigarh: To serve free education to poor village children2. Arogyam Rural Health Mission: Running Arogya Rath- mobile clinic: 356 patients benefited Ayurvedic treatment3. Project- Grihlakshmi: training women for self employment and income generation: 52 women trained4. Project Prithvi: Encouraging alternative agricultural practice5. AIDS awareness programs: 175 volunteers participated6. Free Yoga & Health camps in rural areas of Lailunga block.
